name: 1000xtranslate
description: A collection of tools to translate 1000xRESIST into your language

scripts.install: npm run install:tools && npm run install:exporter && npm run install:sheetifier && npm run install:translator && npm run install:checker && npm run install:desheetifier && npm run install:bbb
scripts.exporter: npm run check && cd 1-exporter && ../tools/check-function.sh && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 main.py
scripts.sheetifier: npm run check && cd 2-sheetifier && ../tools/check-function.sh && node index.js
scripts.desheetifier: npm run check && cd 5-desheetifier && ../tools/check-function.sh && node index.js

author: deseven
